trophy.awardedOn:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating when a trophy was awarded
**UI Location**: Trophy modal, below the trophy name
**When Users See This**: When viewing the details of a revealed trophy in the modal
**Technical Context**: Precedes a dynamically formatted date; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Awarded on"
trophy.clickToReveal:
**Functional Purpose**: Call to action for unrevealed trophies
**UI Location**: Trophy card for an unrevealed trophy
**When Users See This**: When viewing an unrevealed trophy on the Trophies page
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no variables
**Current English**: "Click to Reveal"
trophy.failedToReveal:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when a trophy fails to reveal
**UI Location**: Trophy card for an unrevealed trophy
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to reveal a trophy and the reveal process fails
**Technical Context**: Standard error message; no variables
**Current English**: "Failed to reveal trophy"
trophy.locked:
**Functional Purpose**: Status label for a trophy that has not yet been earned
**UI Location**: Trophy card for a not-earned trophy
**When Users See This**: When viewing an unearned trophy on the Trophies page
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no variables
**Current English**: "Locked"
